attributes.action: All bonuses paid to Thomas Cook Directors MUST be paid back!
attributes.additional_details: We are calling for Thomas Cook's Directors to hand back their bonuses with immediate effect.
attributes.background:
Thomas Cook was a giant of the airline industry.
Over the past few years, bosses have continued to take hefty bonuses. 
All the while, the business was careering towards disaster. 
With the company going into administration, over 9000 employees in the UK have lost their jobs.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition calling for a public inquiry into the collapse of Thomas Cook:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/274851
